text: This morning our CEO @RichardDABurge joined the @BBCLondonNews #politicslondon show, to talk about the impact of a #NoDealBrexit on #London, the need for a #BrexitDeal, as well as the need for continued government support to businesses until the #covid19 #vaccine is rolled out. https://t.co/EcPXnwW0q1
